name: The alchemyst tale
description:
***WARNING***DISCLAIMER***WARNING***

This is prototype game, only for mature +21. All Character that you will see are 18+ and they childish cuteness  does not represent their age. BEWARE

if you are a sensitive person to certain types of topics please leave this game

Most of the artistic content does not correspond to my authorship and I am only using them as placeholders at the moment.

All intellectual and computer content corresponds to my authorship.

There will be a story in the game, at the moment I am finishing with the GDD, when I finish I will publish the whole story with its respective update
